https://docs.google.com/document/d/1dY0eQPbv7qrV0tU9ocEeljpoiOgANSEHAoZurnJVrJE/edit#

field: forensic_watermarking

values:
UNAVAILABLE: the video was not transcoded with forensic watermarking support and canâ€™t be delivered using it.
ACTIVE: the video was transcoded with forensic watermarking and should be used during delivery.
INACTIVE: the video was transcoded with forensic watermarking but should not be used during delivery.

available for:
update video
create video(?)
